name: InfluenzaVaccineAdministrationICD10PCS
title: Influenza Vaccine Administration ICD10PCS
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values identifies patients who are administered the influenza vaccination.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to represent the procedure of administering the influenza vaccine.  Using the Quality Data Model, this data element maps to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only include codes  which represent the procedure of administering a vaccine.   Codes used are to be ICD 10PCS codes only.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)
